title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When attempting to use the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
OB: An error message should not be displayed when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter.
EB: The error message should not be displayed and the table filter should function correctly when using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a new data source and a dataset that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the value1 field of the filter, enter the value new Date('3/2/2005').
